dissonanceFlags.description: The speaker's facial expression does not match the positive tone of their words.
dissonanceFlags.coaching: Practice aligning facial expressions with the message to enhance engagement.
dissonanceFlags.visualEvidence: Neutral facial expression while speaking positively.
dissonanceFlags.verbalEvidence: Positive words spoken without corresponding facial expression.

dissonanceFlags.description: The speaker uses 'this' without pointing to anything specific.
dissonanceFlags.coaching: Use hand gestures to emphasize key points and maintain audience interest.

dissonanceFlags.description: Long pause followed by rapid speech, disrupting the flow.
dissonanceFlags.coaching: Practice maintaining a consistent pace to keep the audience engaged.

dissonanceFlags.description: The speaker uses filler words such as 'so' and 'actually' frequently.
dissonanceFlags.coaching: Minimize filler words to improve clarity and maintain audience focus.
dissonanceFlags.verbalEvidence: Filler words like 'so' and 'actually' are used.

dissonanceFlags.description: The speaker's hands remain relatively still during the explanation of their interests.
dissonanceFlags.coaching: Consider adding more dynamic gestures to complement the spoken content.

dissonanceFlags.description: The speaker occasionally touches their face, which can be distracting.
dissonanceFlags.coaching: Work on reducing nervous movements to appear more confident.

priorities: Match facial expressions to your words

geminiReport.headline: Good presence, refining the details
